reference.title: 2nd Reference Topic
reference.shortdesc: This reference contains even more information.

section.p: The use-case is that you have some reference topic with potentially several child topics. The idea is to provide an overview of all child topics within the body as itemized list and display the short descriptions together with a link to all entries.
This implementation does no use any use-case specific specialization but simply adds the xcr:xsl attribute to a ul element and have a local XSLT script creating the required content.
